tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_photography_trends (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trend_description TEXT,
  trend_image_url VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE style_tracking (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  photographer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  style_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  photo_url VARCHAR(255),
  style_description TEXT,
  tracking_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE photography_styles (
    style_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    style_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    photographer_name VARCHAR(255),
    creation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE industry_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_id INT,
    style_id INT,
    preference_score FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES fashion_trends(trend_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (style_id) REFERENCES photography_styles(style_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Preferences (
  preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  style_id INT,
  trend_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (style_id) REFERENCES Styles(style_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES Trends(trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CreativeDirection (
  direction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  direction_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  direction_description TEXT,
  style_id INT,
  trend_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (style_id) REFERENCES Styles(style_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES Trends(trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    popularity_level ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high')
);
